scenes.scene: Nova speaks to camera in a warm studio. Subtle ember glow. Small corner tag: Business Builders.
scenes.say: I’m Nova. I build the systems that follow up, qualify leads, and book calls while you’re busy doing the real work.

scenes.scene: A simple pipeline animates: New lead → instant reply → timed follow-ups → booked call. Minimal icons.
scenes.say: When someone reaches out, they get a response fast—and the right next step—every single time.

scenes.scene: Inbox items turn into organized notes and tasks. A lead card gains context: pain point, budget, urgency.
scenes.say: I capture context automatically—so you don’t lose the details that close deals.

scenes.scene: A dashboard: Replies sent, follow-ups scheduled, calls booked. Nova glances at it, then back to camera.
scenes.say: You don’t need new tools. You need your current stack to behave like a machine.

scenes.scene: End card: Business Builders • Nova — AI Micro-Agency • Book a call. Subtle ember glow.
scenes.say: If you want more leads without more chaos—hire the agent.
